snippet.title: Dungeon Wizards | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1842610/Dungeon_Wizards/
itch.io: https://tubby-turtle-studios.itch.io/dungeon-wizards
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TubbyTurtleStd
Dungeon Wizards combines classic Rogue-Lite and colorful Match3 with adventurous Roleplay elements. Venture on your very own journey, collect and combine rare relics with powerful spells and face loads of challenging enemies!

#Gametrailer #indiegames #games #videogames
